Item.name: laser helmet
Item.desc: This futuristic helmet comes with a laser turret mounted on top and guide-goggles for easy firing

Item.name: The Blockhead
Item.desc: Originally marketed as "combat goggles," this modified metal block serves as effective all-around head protection

Item.name: arm mount
Item.desc: This arm brace comes with a mount to hold one weapon

Item.name: Parashooter
Item.desc: This gun-on-a-parachute is designed to let you fight from the air.

Item.name: Laser Dart gun
Item.desc: This toy gun shoots red plastic rods (dubbed 'Lasers') at a velocity that is not safe for a kids' toy.

Item.name: Passive Pipsqueak Pistol
Item.desc: This wimpy pistol is too chicken to shoot anyone in the face. Be sure to aim from behind for most damage.

Item.name: Ruby's Railgun
Item.desc: You don't know who Ruby is, but you do know that someone had to spend a lot of money to make this gem-encrusted experimental railgun that doesn't work.

Item.name: Springbow
Item.desc: Someone had the great idea of taking a crossbow and replacing the firing mechanism with a spring.

Item.name: Crossy Bow
Item.desc: This crossbow is always ready to shoot an arrow across the road.

Item.name: Kill switchblade
Item.desc: This dagger has a spring-loaded blade that can be fired as a single-use projectile by pressing the red button on the side of the grip.
